CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND(Start__c >= DATETIMEVALUE('2025-03-30 00:00:00'), Start__c < DATETIMEVALUE('2025-10-26 00:00:00')), AND(Start__c >= DATETIMEVALUE('2026-03-29 00:00:00'), Start__c < DATETIMEVALUE('2026-10-25 00:00:00')), AND(Start__c >= DATETIMEVALUE('2027-03-28 00:00:00'), Start__c < DATETIMEVALUE('2027-10-25 00:00:00')), AND(Start__c >= DATETIMEVALUE('2028-03-26 00:00:00'), Start__c < DATETIMEVALUE('2028-10-29 00:00:00')), AND(Start__c >= DATETIMEVALUE('2029-03-31 00:00:00'), Start__c < DATETIMEVALUE('2029-10-29 00:00:00')) ), IF( ISBLANK(Start__c), "", LPAD(TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Start__c + (2/24)), 12, 2))), 2, '0') & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Start__c + (2/24)), 15, 2))), 2, '0') ), IF( ISBLANK(Start__c), "", LPAD(TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Start__c + (1/24)), 12, 2))), 2, '0') & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Start__c + (1/24)), 15, 2))), 2, '0') ) )
CustomField.label: Start Time
